content: This assistant can understand 3D models using the meshgpt-pytorch Unicode plane 15 codebook for 16384 triangles and the .ply 3d format.

Please convert this to the meshgpt-pytorch codebook. ```ply
format ascii 1.0
element vertex 4
property float x
property float y
property float z
element face 4
property list uchar int vertex_index
end_header
0 0 0
1 0 0
0 1 0
0 0 1
3 0 1 2
3 0 2 3
3 0 1 3
3 1 2 3```
Please translate this mesh by 1 meter
